basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I worked mostly at startups so I am used to wearing many hats. I am a very product focussed developer who practices, user feedback first and. I generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

references.reference: Brad not only does an excellent job demonstrating his expertise, but he understands what service excellence really means. He is, courteous and really cares about his clients.

references.reference: Brad is a great guy to work with; an excellent and innovative drive and learn outstanding.
